channel.title: Comments on: The Pope Say That Pollution Is A Sin – What shall we call it? Degradation

item.title: By: Lamb Of God mp3
item.dc:creator: Lamb Of God mp3
item.description:
<strong>Burn the Priest...</strong>
Lamb of God is an American heavy metal band from Richmond, Virginia, gathered in 1990. The band was firstly known as Burn the Priest and decided to change their name shortly after the release of a self-titled debut album in 1998....
item.content:encoded:
Burn the Priest…

Lamb of God is an American heavy metal band from Richmond, Virginia, gathered in 1990. The band was firstly known as Burn the Priest and decided to change their name shortly after the release of a self-titled debut album in 1998….
